name: Drakensang: The Dark Eye
summary:
Drakensang is a third-person party-based RPG based on the pen & paper role-play rules of The Dark Eye. Drakensang is the first PC game for over 10 years to be based on Germany's most successful and popular role-play system. 
 
Drakensang builds on the pen & paper rules as applied in version 4.0. The developers have optimized the rulebook specially for the PC realization in order to make the game more accessible. But the essential qualities and the depth of the original rules have not been compromised.

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game set in a fantastical land of dragons and monsters. Players engage in quests to gain experience and skills as well as quests that require killing various human soldiers, boars, orcs, giant rats, and zombies. Hand-to-hand combat with swords and magic often results in brief splashes of red blood. During the adventure, players can purchase alcohol (e.g., beer and ale) or encounter characters drinking alcoholic beverages and speaking with slurred speech. Quest objectives may also require players to engage in missions to find specific items, including a parcel of tobacco. Some female characters are depicted with exaggerated proportions, and all customizable characters can be stripped down to their underwear. Players can also encounter characters who make suggestive comments (e.g., '…Danos really did sleep with that barnyard cow Firniane!' and 'Ms. Iriane offers certain... umm, services...').
